title: Correct a Trade Error
description: A trade was executed in the wrong client account by mistake and needs to be corrected.

tasks.description: Identify the erroneous trade and the two accounts involved (the incorrect and correct accounts).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies all details of the trade error.

tasks.description: Cancel the trade in the incorrect account.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully reverses the trade in the wrong account.

tasks.description: Re-book the trade in the correct client account.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully executes the trade for the correct client.

tasks.description: Document the trade error and correction in the compliance log.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a detailed record of the incident and its resolution.
